title: Cancel Event Due to Severe Weather
description: A severe blizzard forces the cancellation of an outdoor winter festival on the day of the event.

tasks.description: Update the event status to 'Canceled' in the master calendar and ticketing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status, which automatically halts any further ticket sales.

tasks.description: Post cancellation notices on the venue's website, social media channels, and mobile app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pushes a coordinated cancellation message across all public-facing platforms.

tasks.description: Send an email and SMS notification to all ticket holders about the cancellation and refund process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a bulk communication to all attendees.

tasks.description: Notify all scheduled staff and vendors that the event is canceled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a cancellation notice to all internal and external stakeholders.
